articles.content: For her glam makeup, the actress opted for nude eyeshadow, mascaraed lashes, darkened brows, blushed cheeks, luminous highlighter and a shade of light pink lipstick.

articles.author: Nupur Sarvaiya
articles.title: Kriti Kharbanda ditched a traditional blouse for a corset with her Ritu Kumar lehenga - VOGUE India
articles.description: With corsets dominating the latest celebrity looks, Kriti Kharbanda has joined the bandwagon with an Indian twist for her wedding to Pulkit Samrat.
articles.content: Kriti Kharbanda stepped into the new-age bride trend, as she chose to wear a corset paired with a lehenga and an attached dupatta. Delicate floral motifs grace this summery pastel look, crafted from … [+1991 chars]
